reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: F.a: Threshold: CA Disabled Women?s Network Strategic Plan 2016-2018

description.narrative: WHAT: The project supports networking of women with disabilities in five Central Asian countries: Kazakhstan, Kirgizstan, Tajikistan, Turkmenistan and Uzbekistan.WHY: The Network provides opportunities for experience sharing and peer support and helps wome n to exchange information and materials. Because of systemic marginalization women with disabilities have low self-esteem and lack information sexual and reproductive health and on their rights.HOW: Information on sexual and reproductive health and rights and bulding of self-esteem is effectively shared through the Network and through peer support. The project benefits the local disabled women who gain experience and information. The Finnish Family Federation provides training on sexual and reproductive hea lth and rights.PARTNER ORGANISATION: The project is coordinated by the Kyrgyz disabled women's organization Ravenstvo and implement by Ravenstvo, Shyrak (Kazakh disabled women's organization) and Ishtirok (Tajik disabled women's organization).
